title: BONUS: ‘CULT MOM’ Lori Vallow husband Chad Daybell arrested after human remains found on his property.
itunes:title: BONUS: ‘CULT MOM’ Lori Vallow husband Chad Daybell arrested after human remains found on his property.
description:
As the search for JJ Vallow and Tylee Ryan continues, Joseph Scott Morgan explains how investigators found human remains on ‘Cult Mom’ Lori Vallow husband Chad Daybell's property. What comes next? Crime Stories investigative reporter Dave Mack joins the discussion.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
